notification_body: Please respond to these questions to the best of your ability.

esm_radios: Little or None: Absent or barely noticeable
Mild: At a low level. It was possible to relax when I tried.
Moderate: It was distressing at times. It was hard to relax or concentrate.
Severe: It was intense most of the time. It was very difficult to relax.
Extreme: It was overwhelming. It was impossible to relax.
esm.esm_instructions: In the past week, when you have felt anxious, how intense or severe was your anxiety?

esm_radios: None. I did not avoid any situations.
Infrequent: I avoid something once in a while.
Occasional: I have some fear of certain situations but it is still manageable.
Frequent: I have considerable fear and I often avoid situations.
All the time: Avoiding situations has taken over my life.
esm.esm_instructions: In the past week, how often did you avoid situations because of anxiety or fear?
